Script: うえの棚には辞書ばかり置いてあります
Meaning: There are only dictionaries on the top shelf

Script: りんごだけを買いました
Meaning: I only bought apples

Script: 花ばかりでなく花瓶も売っています
Meaning: Not only do they sell flowers, but vases as well!

Script: 洋服だけでなく靴も必要ですう
Meaning: I need not only clothes, but shoes as well

Script: 社長さんでも行きました
Meaning: Even the company president went

Script: なおこほど上手ではありません
Meaning: As much as Naoko, I'm not as good he is

Script: コーラを三本ほど飲みました
Meaning: I drank about three Cokes

Script: 歴史上の重要さを考えておきましょう
Meaning: Let’s consider its historical importance (from standpoint of history)

Script: 台所は魚くさいです
Meaning: The kitchen smells of fish

Script: お医者さんは外人みたいです
Meaning: The doctor looks like a foreigner

Script: 鈴木さんの主人はとてもおとこらしい人です
Meaning: Mrs. Suzuki’s husband is a very manly person

Script: セーターなしで出かけてしまいました
Meaning: I went out without a sweater

Script: コンピューターなんてわからないのです
Meaning: I don’t understand such things as computers

Script: その問題に関する正確な資料が得られない
Meaning: No accurate information in relation to the problem can be obtained
Concept: as far as, related to, concerning, about

Script: 鈴木さんは日本の歴史に関して話しました
Meaning: Suzuki spoke about Japanese history
Concept: as far as, related to, concerning, about

Script: 経済に対する報告書はまだ読んでいません
Meaning: I have not yet read the report concerning economics
Concept: towards, against, regarding, in contrast with, about

Script: 私は日本の政治制度について研究しています
Meaning: I am doing a researching regarding Japanese political system
Concept: towards, against, regarding, in contrast with, about

Script: 試験の結果について、先生に聞いてください
Meaning: Please ask the teacher about the results of the exam

Script: とても好きだったので値段に気がづきませんでした
Meaning: Because I like it a lot, I didn’t notice the price

Script: 足元に気をつけてください
Meaning: Please watch your step
Concept: pay attention to, be careful of, watch (out for)

Script: 日本における最も有名な歌手です
Meaning: He is the most famous singer in Japan

Script: 飲み物はアイスコーヒーにします
Meaning: As for something to drink, I’ll make it iced coffee

Script: 私にとってゴルフは一番楽しいです
Meaning: For me, golf is the most fun!

Script: みんなの協力によってできました
Meaning: through the cooperation of everyone, we are able to do it
Concept: through, by the way of, by means of, depending on

Script: 新聞によって世界の出来事をなります
Meaning: Learn about world events by way of newspapers
Concept: through, by the way of, by means of, depending on

Script: 人によって違います
Meaning: It differs depending on the person
Concept: through, by the way of, by means of, depending on

Script: 自転車の代わりにオートバイを借りました
Meaning: I rented a motorcycle instead of a bicycle

Script: お父さんお代わりにお兄さんが行ってもいいです
Meaning: Your brother can go instead of your father

Script: 今日一日中お姉さんのことを考えていました
Meaning: I've been thinking about my sister all day today

Script: 男性のことがわからないのです
Meaning: I don't understand things about men
